verses.en: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he

verses.ar: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.en: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained
He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood
Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber
